bv1:36.1: sādhukārā ca → hiṅkāraṁ sādhukārañca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2)
bv1:36.2: ukkuṭṭhi sampahaṁsanaṁ → ukkuṭṭhi sampasādanaṁ (bj); ukkuṭṭhisampanādanaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); ukkuṭṭhiṁ sampasādanaṁ (pts-vp-pli2)
bv1:68.1: Kālo kho te → kālo deva (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); kāloyaṁ te (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
bv1:73.1: Bhagavā tamhi → bhagavā ca tamhi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr)
